events.name: Ukrainian Drone Strike on Russian Bomber
events.wd_label: Ukrainian Drone Strike on Russian Bomber
events.wd_description: A Ukrainian drone strike destroyed a Russian long-range bomber, a Tupolev Tu-22, at the Soltsy-2 airbase near St. Petersburg.
events.description: A Ukrainian drone strike destroyed a Russian long-range bomber, a Tupolev Tu-22, at the Soltsy-2 airbase near St. Petersburg.

events.name: Details of the Strike
events.wd_description: Images posted on social media show a Tupolev Tu-22 on fire at Soltsy-2 airbase following the Ukrainian drone strike.
events.description: Images posted on social media show a Tupolev Tu-22 on fire at Soltsy-2 airbase following the Ukrainian drone strike.

events.name: Confirmation by Russian Ministry of Defense
events.wd_label: Confirmation by Russian Ministry of Defense
events.wd_description: The Russian Ministry of Defense confirmed that a copter-type UAV attacked the airbase around 10:00 Moscow time and was hit with small-arms fire.
events.description: The Russian Ministry of Defense confirmed that a copter-type UAV attacked the airbase around 10:00 Moscow time and was hit with small-arms fire.

events.name: Impact on Russian Military
events.wd_description: The destruction of one aircraft has little effect on the potency of Russia's current 60-strong Tu-22 fleet.
events.description: The destruction of one aircraft has little effect on the potency of Russia's current 60-strong Tu-22 fleet.

events.name: Growing Capability of Ukrainian Forces
events.wd_description: The operation highlights the increasing ability of Ukrainian forces to strike targets deep inside Russian territory.
events.description: The operation highlights the increasing ability of Ukrainian forces to strike targets deep inside Russian territory.

events.name: Deadly Blast in Kostyantynivka, Ukraine
events.wd_description: A blast in a busy market street in Kostyantynivka, Ukraine, has killed at least 17 people and injured 33 others. President Volodymyr Zelensky condemned the attack, blaming Moscow.
events.description: A blast in a busy market street in Kostyantynivka, Ukraine, has killed at least 17 people and injured 33 others. President Volodymyr Zelensky condemned the attack, blaming Moscow.

events.name: Details of the Blast
events.wd_description: The blast occurred on a busy market street in Kostyantynivka in the middle of the day, hitting a market, pharmacy, and shops.
events.description: The blast occurred on a busy market street in Kostyantynivka in the middle of the day, hitting a market, pharmacy, and shops.

events.name: President Zelensky's Condemnation
events.wd_description: President Volodymyr Zelensky condemned the attack, calling it a deliberate attack on the peaceful city of Kostyantynivka and blaming Moscow.
events.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky condemned the attack, calling it a deliberate attack on the peaceful city of Kostyantynivka and blaming Moscow.

events.name: Casualties and Injuries
events.wd_description: At least 17 people were killed and 33 others were injured in the blast, with the death toll expected to rise.
events.description: At least 17 people were killed and 33 others were injured in the blast, with the death toll expected to rise.

events.name: Investigation Launched
events.wd_description: The Prosecutor-General of Ukraine has launched an investigation into the incident, pursuing criminal proceedings for violation of the laws and customs of war.
events.description: The Prosecutor-General of Ukraine has launched an investigation into the incident, pursuing criminal proceedings for violation of the laws and customs of war.

events.name: U.S. to Supply Ukraine with Advanced Long-Range Missiles
events.wd_label: U.S. to Supply Ukraine with Advanced Long-Range Missiles
events.wd_description: The United States plans to supply Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles, including ATACMS, to assist Kyiv in its ongoing counter-offensive against Russian forces.
events.description: The United States plans to supply Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles, including ATACMS, to assist Kyiv in its ongoing counter-offensive against Russian forces.

events.name: Announcement by President Joe Biden
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden announced plans to provide Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles after meeting with Ukrainian officials at the White House.
events.description: President Joe Biden announced plans to provide Ukraine with advanced long-range missiles after meeting with Ukrainian officials at the White House.

events.name: Details of the ATACMS Missiles
events.wd_description: Ukraine will receive ATACMS missiles, which have a range of up to 190 miles (300km), enabling them to hit Russian targets deep behind the front line.
events.description: Ukraine will receive ATACMS missiles, which have a range of up to 190 miles (300km), enabling them to hit Russian targets deep behind the front line.

events.name: Recent Ukrainian Missile Strikes
events.wd_description: On Friday, two of Ukraine’s missiles struck Russia’s Black Sea fleet headquarters using Storm Shadow missiles supplied by Britain and France.
events.description: On Friday, two of Ukraine’s missiles struck Russia’s Black Sea fleet headquarters using Storm Shadow missiles supplied by Britain and France.

events.name: New Military Aid Package
events.wd_description: Ukraine will receive a new tranche of $325 million in military aid, including artillery and ammunition, as part of the support announced by President Biden.
events.description: Ukraine will receive a new tranche of $325 million in military aid, including artillery and ammunition, as part of the support announced by President Biden.

events.name: DOE Funding Opportunity for EV Battery Recycling
events.wd_label: DOE Funding Opportunity for EV Battery Recycling
events.wd_description: The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) plans to release a funding opportunity to advance electric vehicle (EV) battery recycling, transportation, and design with up to $37 million from Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) funding.
events.description: The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) plans to release a funding opportunity to advance electric vehicle (EV) battery recycling, transportation, and design with up to $37 million from Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) funding.

events.name: BIL Section 40208
events.wd_description: The anticipated FOA supports BIL section 40208, which aims to research, develop, and demonstrate second-life applications for electric drive vehicle batteries and technologies for final recycling and disposal.
events.description: The anticipated FOA supports BIL section 40208, which aims to research, develop, and demonstrate second-life applications for electric drive vehicle batteries and technologies for final recycling and disposal.

events.name: High-Capacity Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The high-capacity battery supply chain consists of raw material production, materials processing, battery material manufacturing and cell fabrication, battery pack and end-use product manufacturing, and battery end-of-life and recycling.
events.description: The high-capacity battery supply chain consists of raw material production, materials processing, battery material manufacturing and cell fabrication, battery pack and end-use product manufacturing, and battery end-of-life and recycling.

events.name: t: Raw Material Production
events.wd_description: The extraction and production of raw materials essential for battery manufacturing.
events.description: The extraction and production of raw materials essential for battery manufacturing.

events.name: t: Materials Processing
events.wd_description: The processing of raw materials into forms suitable for battery manufacturing.
events.description: The processing of raw materials into forms suitable for battery manufacturing.

events.name: t: Battery Material Manufacturing and Cell Fabrication
events.wd_label: t: Battery Material Manufacturing and Cell Fabrication
events.wd_description: The manufacturing of battery materials and the fabrication of battery cells.
events.description: The manufacturing of battery materials and the fabrication of battery cells.

events.name: t: Battery Pack and End-Use Product Manufacturing
events.wd_label: t: Battery Pack and End-Use Product Manufacturing
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery packs and their integration into end-use products.
events.description: The assembly of battery packs and their integration into end-use products.

events.name: t: Battery End-of-Life and Recycling
events.wd_description: The collection, disassembly, and recycling of batteries at the end of their life cycle.
events.description: The collection, disassembly, and recycling of batteries at the end of their life cycle.

events.name: FOA Focus Areas
events.wd_description: The FOA will focus on reducing the costs of battery recycling through improved technologies, processes, and product designs, including the recycling of battery accessory components.
events.description: The FOA will focus on reducing the costs of battery recycling through improved technologies, processes, and product designs, including the recycling of battery accessory components.

events.name: t: Transportation and Preprocessing Technologies
events.wd_description: Technologies and processes that facilitate the transport, disassembly, and preprocessing of end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries to reduce costs.
events.description: Technologies and processes that facilitate the transport, disassembly, and preprocessing of end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries to reduce costs.

events.name: t: Safety Improvements
events.wd_description: Technologies and product designs that improve the safety of transporting and disassembling end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries.
events.description: Technologies and product designs that improve the safety of transporting and disassembling end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries.

events.name: t: Accessory Component Recycling
events.wd_description: Technologies and processes for the recycling and disposal of battery accessory components, including casings and enclosures made from plastics and polymer composites.
events.description: Technologies and processes for the recycling and disposal of battery accessory components, including casings and enclosures made from plastics and polymer composites.
